rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and ventilation adhering to Vastu principles.
Spacious area designed for family gatherings with Mediterranean aesthetic elements.
Open space adjoining the living room to facilitate communal dining, following local norms.
Efficient layout with integrated storage and modern amenities.
Private retreat with ample natural light and a Mediterranean design theme.
Cozy room for guests ensuring comfort and privacy.
Safe and vibrant space designed for children with adequate ventilation.
A dedicated quiet zone filled with books and Mediterranean decorative elements.
Functional space for the domestic help, ensuring privacy while being conveniently located.
